comments.body:
when calling `processor.start()`.  It overrides the `streams.py#start_cmd` which in turn overrides the [Service.start_cmd](http://ducktape-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/_modules/ducktape/services/service.html#Service.start) 

This is needed due to one test starting with Kafka down.  The default implementation verifies Kafka is up, but we need to skip that for the `test_streams_runs_with_broker_down_initially`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +217,221 @@                                                                 configs)

    def start_cmd(self, node):
        args = self.args.copy()
        args['kafka'] = self.kafka.bootstrap_servers(validate=False)
